it.polimi.se2018.classes.network

Class Server

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2018.classes.network.Server

  • public class Server
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Andrea Folini main server of the application intantiate rmi and socket servers handle message exchange between the clients and the proxy view that communicates with the model and the controller

    • Method Detail

      • main

        public void main(int rmiPort,
                 int socketPort,
                 int lobbyTime,
                 int playTime)
        set the configurations parameters and instantiate rmi and socket servers
        Parameters:
        rmiPort - port of rmi server
        socketPort - port of socket server
        lobbyTime - the max waiting time for a lobby
        playTime - the max time of every turn

      • addClient

        public void addClient(VirtualClientInterface newClient)
        add a client to the existing lobby or to a no one
        Parameters:
        newClient - the client that will be add

      • checkUsername

        public java.lang.Boolean checkUsername(java.lang.String username)
        check if a username is alredy used in the current lobby
        Parameters:
        username - the username that needs to be checked
        Returns:
        true if the username if free, false otherwise

      • sendToServer

        public void sendToServer(ViewControllerEvent viewControllerEvent,
                         int clientLobbyNumber,
                         boolean endForDisconnection)
        send the event got from the network to the right proxy view
        Parameters:
        viewControllerEvent - the event that will be send
        clientLobbyNumber - the lobby number of the client that sent the event
        endForDisconnection - true if the event is caused by the turn number that expired or a disconnection, false if it is from a client

      • notValideMoveMessage

        public void notValideMoveMessage(Message message,
                                 int matchNumber)
        send a message to notify a wrong move
        Parameters:
        message - the message for the client
        matchNumber - the lobby number of the client

      • sendStartMatchEvent

        public void sendStartMatchEvent(StartMatchEvent startMatchEvent,
                                int matchNumber)
        send to every player of the right lobby the match data
        Parameters:
        startMatchEvent - contains the parameters of the new match
        matchNumber - the lobby number of the match

      • sendStartRoundEvent

        public void sendStartRoundEvent(StartRoundEvent startRoundEvent,
                                int matchNumber)
        send a notification to every client of the right lobby that a new round started
        Parameters:
        startRoundEvent - contains the parameters for the new round
        matchNumber - the lobby number of the match

      • sendStartTurnEvent

        public void sendStartTurnEvent(StartTurnEvent startTurnEvent,
                               int matchNumber)
        send a notification to every client of the right lobby that a new turn started and start the timer to check player inactivity. the turn get skipped if the player that needs to play is disconnected or suspended
        Parameters:
        startTurnEvent - contains the parameters of the new turn
        matchNumber - the lobby number of the match

      • sendEndRoundEvent

        public void sendEndRoundEvent(EndRoundEvent endRoundEvent,
                              int matchNumber)
        send a notification to every player in the right lobby that the round ended
        Parameters:
        endRoundEvent - contains the parameters of the ended round
        matchNumber - the lobby number of the match

      • sendWindowToChose

        public void sendWindowToChose(WindowSide[] windows,
                              int matchNumber)
        send the window to chose to every player in the right lobby
        Parameters:
        windows - contains the windows for every player
        matchNumber - the lobby number of the match

        Parameters:

                      java.lang.String player)
        send a notification to every player in the right lobby that the time for the turn expired
        Parameters:
        lobbyNumber - the lobby number of the match
        player - the player that will be suspended for inactivity

      • checkNoPlayersLeft

        public boolean checkNoPlayersLeft(int matchNumber)
        check if there are less than two players left in a lobby
        Parameters:
        matchNumber - the lobby number of the match
        Returns:
        true if there are less than two players, false otherwise

      • cancelTimer

        public void cancelTimer(int matchNumber)
        cancel a turn timer when the current player end his turn before the time expires
        Parameters:
        matchNumber - the number of the match which timer needs to be canceled

      • reconnectRMIClient

        public void reconnectRMIClient(java.lang.String username,
                               int lobbyNumber)
        reconnect an rmi client that was suspended
        Parameters:
        username - the name of the client that needs to be reconnected
        lobbyNumber - the lobby number of the client that needs to be reconnected

      • reconnectClient

        public void reconnectClient(VirtualClientInterface reconnectingClient)
        reconnect a suspended client
        Parameters:
        reconnectingClient - the client that needs to be reconnected

      • sendReconnectionUpdate

        public void sendReconnectionUpdate(UpdateReconnectedClientEvent updateReconnectedClientEvent,
                                   int matchNumber)
        send a notification to every player in the right lobby that a player has been reconnected, and send an update of every object of the match
        Parameters:
        updateReconnectedClientEvent - contains the updated objects of the match
        matchNumber - the lobby number of the match
